channel.title: Project: Auorin - fps type runescape, (need graphics designers)
channel.description: Hey everyone im Burgerman the owner of Auorin, which some of you may know closed down about 3 months ago, and since then i have been working my a** off earning money 48hours a week jobs not fun. but you have to do it to get along in life. so i had this idea about a week ago to start auorin back up, however i wanted to do it with changes. i dont want to use the runescape models. i want to make it a full screen fps style game like wow. with new skills, armours, etc. if i was to make this i would base it off either the sims style *character wise*or the wow engine. or maybe integrate both. i will need alot of help i have decided to do this because i am sick of normal private servers they are mostly all the same. i have 4 years in the java/graphics industry. if you want i have created a few buildings in google sketchup whilst waiting for my 3dsmax to arrive. and i will also be using model creators from other games like counter strike mapmaker. to make buildings/mini events etc. if you would like to join me in this please sign up to http://auorin.ath.cx/forums

item.title: Project: Auorin - fps type runescape, (need graphics designers)
item.dc:creator: @nuffenburger nuffenburger
item.description:
@nuffenburger wrote:

yeh this is still rs2 development but on a higher scale.
this is like.
taking something that was good.
and making it better.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2008, 02:40:45 PM[/size][hr]I have started developing this.
i have started with the client which i will post pics of in a few days when i can get all the model skins installed
this client will revolutionize the client industry
lets hope people use it more than normal ugly ones
im going to call this
the 500.5 cache instead of all those ugry 371 etc.
=]

Read full topic

Hey everyone im Burgerman the owner of Auorin, which some of you may know closed down about 3 months ago, and since then i have been working my a** off earning money 48hours a week jobs not fun. but you have to do it to get along in life.
so i had this idea about a week ago
to start auorin back up, however i wanted to do it with changes.
i dont want to use the runescape models.
i want to make it a full screen fps style game like wow.
with new skills, armours, etc.
if i was to make this i would base it off either the sims style character wiseor the wow engine. or maybe integrate both.
i will need alot of help
i have decided to do this because i am sick of normal private servers they are mostly all the same.
i have 4 years in the java/graphics industry.
if you want i have created a few buildings in google sketchup whilst waiting for my 3dsmax to arrive. and i will also be using model creators from other games like counter strike mapmaker. to make buildings/mini events etc.
if you would like to join me in this please sign up to
